original: intros xs1 xs2. induction xs1 as [|x xs1 IH]. - simpl. rewrite LU. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IH. rewrite <- (Assoc L Gamma prodp). rewrite (Assoc L Gamma prodp (fold_left prodp xs1 e)). rewrite (assoc_prodp_fold_left xs1 xs2). reflexivity.
